description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update. If an existing instance is found and this flag is set there will be an error.

Resource_PoolObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Resource_PoolObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Resource_PoolObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Resource_Pool_Data.description: Boolean value indicating if the Resource Pool ID will be included in the display of Resource Pool Name.
Indicates the resource pool is inactive. A resource pool may also be inactivated.

Resource_Pool_HierarchyObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Resource_Pool_HierarchyObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Resource_Pool_HierarchyObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Resource_Pool_Data.description: Resource Pool Hierarchies that this current Resource Pool is inactivated by.

Resource_Pool_HierarchyObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Resource_Pool_HierarchyObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Resource_Pool_HierarchyObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Resource_Pool_Data.description: Resource Pool Hierarchy that this Resource Pool belongs to.

WorkerObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

WorkerObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

WorkerObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Resource_Pool_Data.description: Workers included in this Resource Pool.

description: Resource Pool Data Element used in Resource Pool Web Service Task.
